clinical_study.brief_title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy in Children With Inflammatory Bowel Diseases
clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of the Effectiveness of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy in the Treatment of Inflammatory Bowel Disease in Children

brief_summary.textblock: The study assesses the effectiveness of hyperbaric oxygen therapy in the treatment of inflammatory bowel disease in children.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of the ulcerative colitis activity
primary_outcome.description: Change in the disease activity based on the Paediatric Ulcerative Colitis Activity Index (PUCAI) for patients with ulcerative colitis.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of the Crohn's disease activity
primary_outcome.description: Change in the disease activity based on the Pediatric Crohn's Disease Activity Index (PCDAI) for patients with Crohn's disease.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events and the the severity of these events.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maintaining remission of the ulcerative colitis
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of the clinical remission time (if achieved) assessed according to the Paediatric Ulcerative Colitis Activity Index (PUCAI) for patients with ulcerative colitis.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maintaining remission of the Crohn's disease
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of the clinical remission time (if achieved) assessed according to the Pediatric Crohn's Disease Activity Index (PCDAI) for patients with Crohn's disease.
